name: Space Odissey (ThiagoRubio)
description:
Fly around, dodge and strike back in this endless combat in space. Fight a variety of enemies to score points, use your invulnerability skill wisely and have fun!

How to play:

  • Move with WASD or Arrow keys
  • Shoot with X
  • Use skill with Z

Note: In this version the boss is not visible due to a bug. A fixed version will be upload soon.
